00022 #define NUM_UNITSPHERE_POINTS 42

00025 bool btMinkowskiPenetrationDepthSolver::calcPenDepth(btSimplexSolverInterface& simplexSolver,
00026                                                                                                    const btConvexShape* convexA,const btConvexShape* convexB,
00027                                                                                                    const btTransform& transA,const btTransform& transB,
00028                                                                                                    btVector3& v, btVector3& pa, btVector3& pb,
00029                                                                                                    class btIDebugDraw* debugDraw
00030                                                                                                    )
00031 {
00032 
00033         (void)v;
00034         
00035         bool check2d= convexA->isConvex2d() && convexB->isConvex2d();
00036 
00037         struct btIntermediateResult : public btDiscreteCollisionDetectorInterface::Result
00038         {
00039 
00040                 btIntermediateResult():m_hasResult(false)
00041                 {
00042                 }
00043                 
00044                 btVector3 m_normalOnBInWorld;
00045                 btVector3 m_pointInWorld;
00046                 btScalar m_depth;
00047                 bool    m_hasResult;
00048 
00049                 virtual void setShapeIdentifiersA(int partId0,int index0)
00050                 {
00051                         (void)partId0;
00052                         (void)index0;
00053                 }
00054                 virtual void setShapeIdentifiersB(int partId1,int index1)
00055                 {
00056                         (void)partId1;
00057                         (void)index1;
00058                 }
00059                 void addContactPoint(const btVector3& normalOnBInWorld,const btVector3& pointInWorld,btScalar depth)
00060                 {
00061                         m_normalOnBInWorld = normalOnBInWorld;
00062                         m_pointInWorld = pointInWorld;
00063                         m_depth = depth;
00064                         m_hasResult = true;
00065                 }
00066         };
00067 
00068         //just take fixed number of orientation, and sample the penetration depth in that direction
00069         btScalar minProj = btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT);
00070         btVector3 minNorm(btScalar(0.), btScalar(0.), btScalar(0.));
00071         btVector3 minA,minB;
00072         btVector3 seperatingAxisInA,seperatingAxisInB;
00073         btVector3 pInA,qInB,pWorld,qWorld,w;
00074 
00075 #ifndef __SPU__
00076 #define USE_BATCHED_SUPPORT 1
00077 #endif
00078 #ifdef USE_BATCHED_SUPPORT
00079 
00080         btVector3       supportVerticesABatch[NUM_UNITSPHERE_POINTS+MAX_PREFERRED_PENETRATION_DIRECTIONS*2];
00081         btVector3       supportVerticesBBatch[NUM_UNITSPHERE_POINTS+MAX_PREFERRED_PENETRATION_DIRECTIONS*2];
00082         btVector3       seperatingAxisInABatch[NUM_UNITSPHERE_POINTS+MAX_PREFERRED_PENETRATION_DIRECTIONS*2];
00083         btVector3       seperatingAxisInBBatch[NUM_UNITSPHERE_POINTS+MAX_PREFERRED_PENETRATION_DIRECTIONS*2];
00084         int i;
00085 
00086         int numSampleDirections = NUM_UNITSPHERE_POINTS;
00087 
00088         for (i=0;i<numSampleDirections;i++)
00089         {
00090                 btVector3 norm = getPenetrationDirections()[i];
00091                 seperatingAxisInABatch[i] =  (-norm) * transA.getBasis() ;
00092                 seperatingAxisInBBatch[i] =  norm   * transB.getBasis() ;
00093         }
00094 
00095         {
00096                 int numPDA = convexA->getNumPreferredPenetrationDirections();
00097                 if (numPDA)
00098                 {
00099                         for (int i=0;i<numPDA;i++)
00100                         {
00101                                 btVector3 norm;
00102                                 convexA->getPreferredPenetrationDirection(i,norm);
00103                                 norm  = transA.getBasis() * norm;
00104                                 getPenetrationDirections()[numSampleDirections] = norm;
00105                                 seperatingAxisInABatch[numSampleDirections] = (-norm) * transA.getBasis();
00106                                 seperatingAxisInBBatch[numSampleDirections] = norm * transB.getBasis();
00107                                 numSampleDirections++;
00108                         }
00109                 }
00110         }
00111 
00112         {
00113                 int numPDB = convexB->getNumPreferredPenetrationDirections();
00114                 if (numPDB)
00115                 {
00116                         for (int i=0;i<numPDB;i++)
00117                         {
00118                                 btVector3 norm;
00119                                 convexB->getPreferredPenetrationDirection(i,norm);
00120                                 norm  = transB.getBasis() * norm;
00121                                 getPenetrationDirections()[numSampleDirections] = norm;
00122                                 seperatingAxisInABatch[numSampleDirections] = (-norm) * transA.getBasis();
00123                                 seperatingAxisInBBatch[numSampleDirections] = norm * transB.getBasis();
00124                                 numSampleDirections++;
00125                         }
00126                 }
00127         }
00128 
00129 
00130 
00131 
00132         convexA->batchedUnitVectorGetSupportingVertexWithoutMargin(seperatingAxisInABatch,supportVerticesABatch,numSampleDirections);
00133         convexB->batchedUnitVectorGetSupportingVertexWithoutMargin(seperatingAxisInBBatch,supportVerticesBBatch,numSampleDirections);
00134 
00135         for (i=0;i<numSampleDirections;i++)
00136         {
00137                 btVector3 norm = getPenetrationDirections()[i];
00138                 if (check2d)
00139                 {
00140                         norm[2] = 0.f;
00141                 }
00142                 if (norm.length2()>0.01)
00143                 {
00144 
00145                         seperatingAxisInA = seperatingAxisInABatch[i];
00146                         seperatingAxisInB = seperatingAxisInBBatch[i];
00147 
00148                         pInA = supportVerticesABatch[i];
00149                         qInB = supportVerticesBBatch[i];
00150 
00151                         pWorld = transA(pInA);  
00152                         qWorld = transB(qInB);
00153                         if (check2d)
00154                         {
00155                                 pWorld[2] = 0.f;
00156                                 qWorld[2] = 0.f;
00157                         }
00158 
00159                         w       = qWorld - pWorld;
00160                         btScalar delta = norm.dot(w);
00161                         //find smallest delta
00162                         if (delta < minProj)
00163                         {
00164                                 minProj = delta;
00165                                 minNorm = norm;
00166                                 minA = pWorld;
00167                                 minB = qWorld;
00168                         }
00169                 }
00170         }       
00171 #else
00172 
00173         int numSampleDirections = NUM_UNITSPHERE_POINTS;
00174 
00175 #ifndef __SPU__
00176         {
00177                 int numPDA = convexA->getNumPreferredPenetrationDirections();
00178                 if (numPDA)
00179                 {
00180                         for (int i=0;i<numPDA;i++)
00181                         {
00182                                 btVector3 norm;
00183                                 convexA->getPreferredPenetrationDirection(i,norm);
00184                                 norm  = transA.getBasis() * norm;
00185                                 getPenetrationDirections()[numSampleDirections] = norm;
00186                                 numSampleDirections++;
00187                         }
00188                 }
00189         }
00190 
00191         {
00192                 int numPDB = convexB->getNumPreferredPenetrationDirections();
00193                 if (numPDB)
00194                 {
00195                         for (int i=0;i<numPDB;i++)
00196                         {
00197                                 btVector3 norm;
00198                                 convexB->getPreferredPenetrationDirection(i,norm);
00199                                 norm  = transB.getBasis() * norm;
00200                                 getPenetrationDirections()[numSampleDirections] = norm;
00201                                 numSampleDirections++;
00202                         }
00203                 }
00204         }
00205 #endif // __SPU__
00206 
00207         for (int i=0;i<numSampleDirections;i++)
00208         {
00209                 const btVector3& norm = getPenetrationDirections()[i];
00210                 seperatingAxisInA = (-norm)* transA.getBasis();
00211                 seperatingAxisInB = norm* transB.getBasis();
00212                 pInA = convexA->localGetSupportVertexWithoutMarginNonVirtual(seperatingAxisInA);
00213                 qInB = convexB->localGetSupportVertexWithoutMarginNonVirtual(seperatingAxisInB);
00214                 pWorld = transA(pInA);  
00215                 qWorld = transB(qInB);
00216                 w       = qWorld - pWorld;
00217                 btScalar delta = norm.dot(w);
00218                 //find smallest delta
00219                 if (delta < minProj)
00220                 {
00221                         minProj = delta;
00222                         minNorm = norm;
00223                         minA = pWorld;
00224                         minB = qWorld;
00225                 }
00226         }
00227 #endif //USE_BATCHED_SUPPORT
00228 
00229         //add the margins
00230 
00231         minA += minNorm*convexA->getMarginNonVirtual();
00232         minB -= minNorm*convexB->getMarginNonVirtual();
00233         //no penetration
00234         if (minProj < btScalar(0.))
00235                 return false;
00236 
00237         btScalar extraSeparation = 0.5f;
00238         minProj += extraSeparation+(convexA->getMarginNonVirtual() + convexB->getMarginNonVirtual());
00239 
00240 
00241 
00242 
00243 
00244 //#define DEBUG_DRAW 1
00245 #ifdef DEBUG_DRAW
00246         if (debugDraw)
00247         {
00248                 btVector3 color(0,1,0);
00249                 debugDraw->drawLine(minA,minB,color);
00250                 color = btVector3 (1,1,1);
00251                 btVector3 vec = minB-minA;
00252                 btScalar prj2 = minNorm.dot(vec);
00253                 debugDraw->drawLine(minA,minA+(minNorm*minProj),color);
00254 
00255         }
00256 #endif //DEBUG_DRAW
00257 
00258         
00259 
00260         btGjkPairDetector gjkdet(convexA,convexB,&simplexSolver,0);
00261 
00262         btScalar offsetDist = minProj;
00263         btVector3 offset = minNorm * offsetDist;
00264         
00265 
00266 
00267         btGjkPairDetector::ClosestPointInput input;
00268                 
00269         btVector3 newOrg = transA.getOrigin() + offset;
00270 
00271         btTransform displacedTrans = transA;
00272         displacedTrans.setOrigin(newOrg);
00273 
00274         input.m_transformA = displacedTrans;
00275         input.m_transformB = transB;
00276         input.m_maximumDistanceSquared = btScalar(BT_LARGE_FLOAT);//minProj;
00277         
00278         btIntermediateResult res;
00279         gjkdet.setCachedSeperatingAxis(-minNorm);
00280         gjkdet.getClosestPoints(input,res,debugDraw);
00281 
00282         btScalar correctedMinNorm = minProj - res.m_depth;
00283 
00284 
00285         //the penetration depth is over-estimated, relax it
00286         btScalar penetration_relaxation= btScalar(1.);
00287         minNorm*=penetration_relaxation;
00288         
00289 
00290         if (res.m_hasResult)
00291         {
00292 
00293                 pa = res.m_pointInWorld - minNorm * correctedMinNorm;
00294                 pb = res.m_pointInWorld;
00295                 v = minNorm;
00296                 
00297 #ifdef DEBUG_DRAW
00298                 if (debugDraw)
00299                 {
00300                         btVector3 color(1,0,0);
00301                         debugDraw->drawLine(pa,pb,color);
00302                 }
00303 #endif//DEBUG_DRAW
00304 
00305 
00306         }
00307         return res.m_hasResult;
00308 }
